item.description:
Hi beautiful members!
The Spring is in full swing!
Are you wishing about getting some warm, refreshing energy to prepare yourself for the upcoming summer?
I invite you to experience the benefit of the Five Tibetan Rites.

 For the those of you who likes yoga this workshop will be a great treat!

This is a system of exercises reported to be more than 2,500 years old and that is known also as the yoga for the Endocrine system and the key for opening The Fountain of Youth!
How to access that "Fountain of Youth"? Do you need to work out for hours to get there?
All you need is 10-15 minutes a day!
Learn and practice this simple healing technique with an instructor and later on your own.

The Five Tibetan Rites
were first publicized by Peter Kelder in a 1939 publication entitled The Eye of Revelation and described as a continuous sequence of five movements that

- increase energy,
- calm the mind,
- strengthen the body,
- slow the aging process
and
bring joy into one’s life

"I love this program. It can make a tremendous difference in your health, your energy, and the way you live your life." -John Gray, author of Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus

“I was just visited by friends who hadn’t seen me since I began the rites a month ago. They exclaimed, Why Carolyn, you look 20 years younger! What have you been doing?” I feel it is the five rites, plus knowing that yes, aging can be reversed, and I can do it!” - Carolyn Sheldon Olga, WA


For more information about the Five Tibetan Rites click here
http://www.healingmirrors.org/Site1/Body%26Brain%20Workout/7E65FA9B-26D6-4CB4-BDFF-D46195E5A33F.html
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The one hour and 30 minutes workshop will provide you with some information about (Ki or Chi) energy flow in your body's system through your energy centers, or chakras, and their relation to your endocrine system.

The exercise routine will include 

~warm up,

~Qi-Gong movements with breathing 

~The 5 Tibetans,

~relaxation

and sharing time.

Please wear comfortable clothes, and bring your yoga mat and a water bottle.

Recommended reading before class The Eye of Revelation by Peter Kelder.
or
Ancient Secret of the Fountain of Youth by Peter Kelder and Bernie Siegel book 1 and 2
I hope to meet you soon!
Angela

The price is $20
item.name: Tapping into the Fountain of Youth
